meanings.sent1: She enjoys enamelling her jewelry to give it a shiny finish.
meanings.sent2: The artist is enamelling a beautiful vase with colorful designs.
meanings.sent3: The children had a fun time enamelling their toy cars with bright colors.
meanings.sent4: Her smile enamelled her face with joy after receiving the award.
meanings.sent5: The sun enamelling the sky with hues of pink and orange was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: The art or process of applying enamel to a surface.
meanings.sent1: Learning enamelling requires patience and precision.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed exquisite examples of enamelling on metal objects.
meanings.sent3: The class giggled when the teacher accidentally spilled enamelling powder everywhere.
meanings.sent4: His words were like enamelling, adding a glossy layer of charm to his storytelling.
meanings.sent5: The intricate enamelling on the antique brooch caught the eye of every visitor.
